title: About Me
metaDescription: Learn more about my background, skills, and work philosophy

personalStory.title: Personal Story
paragraphs: I'm a self-taught developer who started building websites in high school and never looked back. What began as a hobby turned into a career that's taken me from startups to Fortune 500 companies.

I believe in building things that work. No fancy buzzwords, no over-engineering - just solid code that solves real problems. When you need someone who can handle the full stack - frontend, backend, design, deployment - I'm your engineer.

missionStatement.title: Mission Statement
paragraphs: I build digital solutions that work. No fancy buzzwords, no over-engineering, just solid code that solves real problems. Think of me as your digital contractor - I show up, I work hard, and I get the job done right.

From startups to Fortune 500s, I've been the guy who fixes what's broken and builds what's needed. When you need someone who can handle the full stack - frontend, backend, design, deployment - I'm your engineer.

items.text: Build scalable web applications from concept to deployment
Design intuitive user experiences that people actually want to use
Architect robust backend systems that handle real-world scale
Lead development teams and mentor junior engineers
Listen to your needs, not just your wants
Build with the future in mind, not just today
Document what matters, maintain what works
